text: Mário Fernandes da Graça Machungo (1 December 1940 - 17 February 2020) was a Mozambican politician. He was Planning Minister from at least 1984 to 1986, when he became Prime Minister of the country from 17 July 1986 to 16 December 1994. Machungo died on 17 February 2020 at the age of 79.Morreu Mário Machungo, antigo primeiro-ministro de Moçambique ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of Mozambique
title: Mário da Graça Machungo
